group_1.textLeft: Felicia and Momoko's group are all back.
That's everyone now, right?

group_1.textRight: I never thought you would all be playing at a@game center together.
If you're going to be late,@could you at least let me know?
I got a bit careless!
Sorry, Yachiyo,@even though you left the subway to me Iãƒ¼

group_1.textLeft: It's okay, we got plenty of information.

group_1.textRight: Iroha informed me of the photo,@but have there been more developments?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
Between mine and Tsuruno's research, we've found@some things.
Mifuyu also gave some suggestions regarding@Mirrors.

group_1.textRight: Hm, then our next move must be just about set.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, we have a plan.
All that's left is to tell everyone the plan@and see if there's any problems with it.

group_1.textRight: Then why don't we start right away?
Go for it, Iroha.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, I'll explain, but I haven't put all my thoughts@into it yet, so...

group_1.narration: First of all,@we've found that we can enter the subway@through a ventilation shaft that's near the labyrinth@as well as through the underground area@of Kamihama Prison.
This time we will break in through three points,@including these two just mentioned,@as well as the original trainyard path.
For now,@we can assume Promised Blood is in the labyrinth,@ready to move the offshoot Mirrors,
and considering they had their fighting team@in front of the trainyard last time,@they should be in front of the labyrinth this time.

group_1.textRight: So if they're in front of the trainyard like last time,
won't we all be in a pinch just like Kanagi was...?

group_1.textLeft: If that happens, then you just retreat,@'cause that's a good thing.

group_1.textRight: It is?

group_1.textLeft: If we can bust in through that ventilation shaft@and the prison, we'll be at the labyrinth in no time.
By the way, my side can confirm that the road@was not actually blocked.

group_1.textRight: Indeed, I went with her and saw no issues.

group_1.textLeft: With a seal of approval that big,@I certainly feel more secure.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I sure do.
But we still need to be careful, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's right. There doesn't seem to be any signal underground...

group_1.textRight: Since Kamihama Prison is underground...
Going through the trainyard would be the same@thing...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I don't think anyone will be able to contact@each other once we're underground...

group_1.textRight: I believe we should decide on a starting time@in advance.
I'd prefer we prepare carefully without hurryin',
so I'd like a little more time, myself.

group_1.textLeft: They're trying to get the offshoot Mirrors moving, though...

group_1.textRight: Sorry, Hinano.@It's for our own reasons...
They've been rattling Rena every which way,
so I just want a little time for her to calm down.

group_1.textLeft: Then I should mention Felicia is the same.
Yeah, she would only say a few words,@then stay silent. She doesn't seem very well.
If we don't hurry and get into gear,@someone's going to be backed into a corner.
Even though we're racing against time,@I guess maybe we should be cautious...

group_1.textRight: Also, Felicia told me not to tell this to anyone,
but it looked like she was cryin' her eyes out@at the game center.

group_1.textLeft: Was she really...?

group_1.textRight: She ended up smashing the punching machine apart.

group_1.textLeft: What!?

group_1.textRight: I hate to say it, but maybe we should leave her off@the member list this time.

group_1.textLeft: I can already see her sulking...

group_1.textRight: I have to agree with it.
Hm...
If we don't prepare ourselves for tomorrow,@we'll end up like we did last time.
She will only cause more discord,@so she won't be of use to us.
So to catch them off-guard in our attack,@I say we set the time at 5:30 dawn.
We'll make it all happen then.
Every participating member@is responsible for herself.

group_1.textLeft: Right, anyone who has a problem,@take care of it before then.
We'll see how every member is doing and make a@final judgment call then.
Since the Union's relations are in such a sensitive@state now...

group_1.textRight: I have no objections to that.
If you can't make it, give me a call 30 minutes before@the start.
Iroha, are you okay with this?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.

group_1.narration: Then at 5:30 dawn,@we will begin our plan with all the members listed here.
And at the same time,@Mifuyu-san's investigation team will be moving@to destroy the terminal they found the other day.
We don't know what will happen,@but we're hoping it will lead to Promised Blood's@offshoot Mirrors that they've been using,
so we will be taking unchosen Magical Girls with us as well.

group_1.textCenter: With that, I hope to see everyone at dawn.

group_1.textRight: I can stay with you guys tonight, right, Master?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, of course.
